constituent: overthrow, person, arrival, climax, wall, one, ceiling, elbow, soil, dirt, ground, sword, sabre, saber
koohiiStory1: The A-Team are planning to overthrow the government. However, they can´t do a damn thing until Mr T arrives.
koohiiStory2: In Return of the Jedi, after a climactic light sabre battle, Luke and Vader overthrow the emporer (literally throwing him over the balcony).
kunYomi: たお.れる、-だお.れ、たお.す
myStory: chữ Đảo. ngã, lộn ngược. nhân + đáo (chu đáo, đến nơi. chí + đao).  người đến nơi thì mệt quá, bị đảo).
readingExamples: 倒す (たお.す), 倒れる (たお.れる)
words: throw down, beat, bring down, blow down, fell, knock down, trip up, defeat, ruin, overthrow, kill, leave unpaid, cheat
